name: LPG power system FASENERGOMASH 100 KW
description:
in cascade Type and consist of following parts:

2 pcs of FAS 50-3 / M generators, every pcs. 50 KW
1 pcs. electrical panel load
1 pcs. sync block

Technical details: Generatorset

- Synchronous 4-pole, brushless, 1-bearing
- Operating speed of every generator, rpm 1500
- Number of phases: 3
- Rated Voltage 400 Volt
- Ampere rating, A 76
- Rated frequency, Hz 50
- The maximum power, LPG 100 KW
- LPG consumption, 17,5 m3 / h
- The noise level, not more, dB 72
- Type of engine: ММZ-243
- Bore × Stroke 110х125 mm
- Engine capacity, 4750 cm3 per pc.
- battery 12 V 90 A*h
- engine starting: electric starter

Cascade design ensures:

- capacity until 100 KW of electrical energy
- optimal fuel consumption at part load
- Low noise during operation
